titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 5682) to exempt from certain requirements of the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 a proposed nuclear agreement for cooperation with India.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-724, by Mr. Bishop (UT).

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 250.

action.text: Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 5682.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1101.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 355 - 55 (Roll no. 529).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 12/8/2006--Passed House without amendment. Makes it in order to consider the conference report to accompany H.R. 5682 (Henry J. Hyde United States and India Nuclear Cooperation Promotion Act of 2006). Waives all points of order against the conference report and considers it as read.
